headline: Indium Laser Cleaning
alternativeHeadline: Advanced Laser Ablation Techniques for Indium
description: Laser cleaning of indium requires precise control due to its low melting point (156.6°C) and softness. Pulsed fiber lasers at 1064 nm provide optimal absorption for removing oxides and contaminants wi...

about.name: Indium
about.description: Indium material for laser cleaning applications

mainEntity.name: How to Laser Clean Indium
mainEntity.description: Process for laser cleaning Indium using 1064 nm (primary), 532 nm (optional for finer control) wavelength

step.name: Material Preparation
step.text: Secure Indium component in laser processing fixture

step.text: Configure laser parameters: 1064 nm (primary), 532 nm (optional for finer control) wavelength

step.name: Surface Treatment
